data.title: Population & Demographics in Milton, NY
data.text:
Basic statistics for the town of Milton in Saratoga County, New York are presented below:

Population: Approximately 18,575 residents

Area: Around 33.3 square miles

Population Density: Approximately 559 people per square mile

Median Household Income: $74,276

Number of Households: 7,244 households

Median Age: 39.5 years

Educational Institutions: 5 public schools

Median Home Value: $204,800

Poverty Rate: 6.4%

Total Number of Businesses: Approximately 600

Unemployment Rate: 3.1%

Average Family Size: 3.04 persons

Crime Rate: Considered low

Major Employers: Educational and healthcare services

Notable Landmarks: Saratoga County Airport
